author: sky.cactus
content:
> someone showed up in the ETHGlobal discord saying they got banned from here and that they were sorry
<@420951281910284289> I get this excuse from advertisers and marketers all the time.  "Oh sorry, I didn't know it was rude to drop into your channel and post an advertisement without any attempt at discussion or dialog."

author: iannorden
content:
Not sure what chan this question is most appropriate for so I'll start here. 

When EIP-158 removes empty accounts does that change the reference at the path where those nodes existed to empty []byte{} or to crypto.Keccak256(rlp.EncodeToBytes([]byte{}))?
